comments.body: Why would anyone want to answer? There's plenty of info about both all over the Net.1. Since it isn't "Hiddenburg" but rather "Hindenburg," maybe you are talking about Shangri-la, or who knows what?2. Titanic was structural weakness and sailors' negligence.3. The Hindenburg was sabotage, because both the German and American official stances were that it was a natural occurrence.
